name: Yodelay
tag_list: seo, ppc, affiliate, social, social-enterprise, non-profit
overview:
Yodelay provides a win-win relationship between Businesses and Charities.

It is a Digital Marketing Consultancy that provides businesses with Web Design and Promotional Services whilst giving 70% of it’s Net Profits to Charity.

Yodelay provide a Business a high demand service and training in order to leverage digital technologies to grow their businesses whilst providing charities with a sustainable source of income.

The remaining 30% of net profit is then reinvested back into the company to enable further growth and to allow the team to focus on additional projects regarding Innovation of Internet Technologies. E.G. Qosmosis - a secure data matching service for medical research laboratories worldwide.

We like to provide Creative Solutions to companies wishing to expand online including giving charities a new approach to raising funding e.g. East Anglian Air Ambulance. E.G. http://businessonboard.org.uk/

All of our projects will take the same Social Enterprise model and 70/30 % split.

Yodelay are based in the UK and have plans to expand through franchising their Brand and Ethos throughout the UK and beyond.
